message.entry: The transformation between ''{0}'' and ''{1}'' is unavailable at source time {2}. The given time falls outside the buffered time window. Increase the ''BufferTime'' of the transformation tree or, use the timeout in ''getTransform'' to wait for a source time.
Frames ''{0}'' and ''{1}'' are not connected in the transformation tree. Make sure that the frame names are correct or, wait for the transformation to be available on ROS 2 network.
Unexpected message type ''{1}'' in topic ''{0}''. Valid message type is: ''{2}''.
Invalid rotation quaternion between coordinate frames ''{0}'' and ''{1}''. It is replaced by unit quaternion in ROS 2 transformation tree.
ROS 2 node is no longer accessible by the transformation tree. Recreate the transformation tree on a valid node.
Invalid network reference stored by the ROS 2 transformation tree. Recreate the transformation tree.
Multiple ROS 2 transformation trees with the same reference on node. Recreate the transformation tree on another node.
Error occurred while requesting information on the ROS 2 transformation tree.
